name: Beef Burger
description: Our classic Beef Burger features a juicy authentic Angus Beef pattie, melted cheese, fresh lettuce, onions, relish and our special Cosy Kangaroo sauce.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Beautiful slow cooked chicken thigh in a coconut cream based curry. Mild spice and served on Jasmine rice with fresh coriander.

name: Chicken Rice Bowl
description: Tender chicken breasts marinated in a tomato based sauce. Served with fresh seasonal vegetables on a bed of Jasmine rice.

name: Meat Platter
description: The "I'm starving" meat platter. Includes chicken and pork skewers, lamb gyros and char-grilled potatoes. Served with Chips and Pita Bread.

name: Pesto Pasta Salad
description: Our light and tangy Pesto Pasta Salad is a refreshing yet filling meal. Served with lettuce and tomatoes with our homemade dressing.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Homemade pizza base topped with a tomato base and a selection of cheeses. Cooked over wood fire and served with fresh herbs.

name: Poke Bowl
description: Our Hawaiian influenced Poke Bowl includes raw tuna, pickled carrot, rice, and fresh vegetables. A healthy and delicious option.

name: Eye Fillet Steak
description: Slow cooked Beef Eye Fillet Steak. Cooked to your liking and served with Chips and a Salad, with a choice of Mushroom, Gravy or Garlic sauce.

name: Sushi Platter
description: A variety of Sushi served together with Soy Sauce and Vinegar. Salmon, Tuna, Crab and Chicken Sushi included (x2 of each).
